sentences: The Secretariat introduced this item (FCCC/SB/2010/INF.4; FCCC/SBSTA/2010/INF.6 and INF.11).

The EGTT reported on the work of the EGTT, in particular on operational modalities for the proposed technology mechanisms, and presented the Report on Options to Facilitate Collaborative Technology Research and Development (FCCC/SBSTA/INF.11).
Several parties, noting the possible creation of a technology mechanism by the COP, suggested focusing efforts on negotiations on this issue under the AWG-LCA.
Carlos Fuller (Belize) and Ronald Schillemans (the Netherlands) will co-chair a joint SBSTA/SBI contact group.
